byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: PARIS, April 1--Prime Minister Neville Chamberlain's declaration in the House of Commons on the decisions of the Allied Supreme War Council is expected to assist in strengthening the position of Premier Paul Reynaud before the Chamber of Deputies,...

headline.main: REYNAUD PREPARES TO MEET CHAMBER; Ministers Approve War Council Decisions He Will Reveal to Deputies Today HIS FUTURE UP TO SENATE Secret Session a Week Hence Is Expected to Determine Paris Cabinet's Tenure

lead_paragraph: PARIS, April 1--Prime Minister Neville Chamberlain's declaration in the House of Commons on the decisions of the Allied Supreme War Council is expected to assist in strengthening the position of Premier Paul Reynaud before the Chamber of Deputies, which convenes tomorrow.
